alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 10:38PM MST until January 31 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...Until noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 10 PM Today to noon Tuesday: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim
